sentence.Network_en: Method: use the narcosis to cure pelvic hematocele syndromes 54 cases.
sentence.Network_cn: 方法: 对54例盆腔淤血综合征的患者采用麻醉的方法治疗.

sentence.Network_en: Deep - sea divers can suffer nitrogen narcosis from breathing air under high pressure.
sentence.Network_cn: 深海潜水者会因在高压下呼吸而出现氮麻醉.

sentence.Network_en: Conclusion: It is better effect to pelvic hematocele syndromes treated by narcosis.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论: 麻醉治疗盆腔淤血综合征效果好.
